title: Petrofac plea deal in bribery investigation
dc:creator: Erica Ascher
description:

The post Petrofac plea deal in bribery investigation appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
content:encoded:
Reuters was ahead by six seconds on Oct 4 with news that British oil services company Petrofac had reached a plea deal with Britain’s Serious Fraud Office in a four-year bribery investigation.

The post Petrofac plea deal in bribery investigation appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
